sandwiches.name: Classic Reuben
sandwiches.description: A mouthwatering combination of corned beef, Swiss cheese, sauerkraut, and thousand island dressing all grilled to perfection

sandwiches.name: Turkey Club
sandwiches.description: Sliced turkey breast, creamy avocado, crispy bacon, lettuce, and tomato on lightly toasted whole-grain bread.

sandwiches.name: Veggie Delight
sandwiches.description: A colorful medley of roasted red peppers, cucumber, spinach, red onion, and hummus on a delicious ciabatta roll.

sandwiches.name: Pastrami Melt
sandwiches.description: Generous layers of pastrami, melted Swiss cheese, and tangy mustard on rye bread.

sandwiches.name: Caprese Panini
sandwiches.description: Fresh mozzarella, ripe tomatoes, basil pesto, and balsamic glaze pressed between slices of ciabatta.

sandwiches.name: Egg Salad Croissant
sandwiches.description: Creamy egg salad with a hint of dijon mustard, served on a buttery croissant.

sandwiches.name: Spicy Italian
sandwiches.description: A zesty blend of pepperoni, salami, provolone cheese, hot peppers, and Italian dressing on a toasted baguette.

sandwiches.name: Chicken Pesto
sandwiches.description: Grilled chicken breast topped with mozzarella, fresh tomatoes, and homemade pesto sauce on focaccia bread.

sandwiches.name: BBQ Pulled Pork
sandwiches.description: Slow-cooked pulled pork smothered in BBQ sauce, topped with coleslaw on a soft brioche bun.

sides.name: French Fries
sides.description: Golden and perfectly seasoned, our fries are the ultimate comfort food. Dip them in ketchup or your favorite sauce for an extra kick.

sides.name: Onion Rings
sides.description: Thick-cut onions coated in a crispy batter, fried to perfection. These rings are both crunchy and flavorful.

sides.name: Side Salad
sides.description: A refreshing mix of greens, cherry tomatoes, cucumber, and your choice of dressing. Light and healthy!

sides.name: Blooming Onion
sides.description: Our blooming onion is a whole onion sliced and battered, then deep-fried until it blooms into a crispy, flavorful treat. Served with a zesty sauce.

sides.name: Sweet Potato Fries
sides.description: Crispy sweet potato fries seasoned with a touch of cinnamon and sugar, served with a side of honey mustard dipping sauce.

sides.name: Mac & Cheese Bites
sides.description: Bite-sized morsels of creamy macaroni and cheese, coated in breadcrumbs and fried to a golden brown.

sides.name: Pickle Spears
sides.description: Dill pickle spears coated in a light batter and fried until crispy. A tangy and crunchy delight.
